mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_shopping_cart t INNER JOIN t_goods_sku t1 ON t1.id = t.sku_id AND t1.is_delete = 0 AND t1.quantity > 0 WHERE t.is_delete = 0 AND t.account_id = #{accountId}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT t.id, t2.store_id, t2.store_name, t1.goods_id, t2.img_url, t2.`name`, t1.price, t1.market_price, t.sku_id, t1.attrs, t.attrs_json, t.amount, t1.quantity, !t1.is_delete and t1.quantity > 0 and t2.status state FROM t_shopping_cart t INNER JOIN t_goods_sku t1 ON t1.id = t.sku_id INNER JOIN t_goods t2 ON t2.id = t1.goods_id WHERE t.is_delete = 0 AND t.account_id = #{accountId} ) t ORDER BY t.state, t.id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE t_shopping_cart t INNER JOIN t_goods_sku t1 ON t1.id = t.sku_id SET t.is_delete = 1 WHERE t.account_id = #{accountId} AND ( t1.is_delete = 1 OR 1 > t1.quantity )
